ActivityMetadata.Name: GH List child teams
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH List child teams
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Lists the child teams of the team specified by `{team_slug}`.
**Note:** You can also specify a team by `org_id` and `team_id` using the route `GET /organizations/{org_id}/team/{team_id}/teams`.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

List child teams

Lists the child teams of the team specified by `{team_slug}`. **Note:** You can also specify a team by `org_id` and `team_id` using the route `GET /organizations/{org_id}/team/{team_id}/teams`.

Method: Get

OperationID: teams/list-child-in-org

EndPoint:

/orgs/{org}/teams/{team_slug}/teams
